name: @ripe-rnd/ui-datastores
description: library with adapters, (de)serializers, data transformers for UI containers

scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm --registry http://pulpo.ripe.net:4873 publish && git checkout master && git checkout release package.json
scripts.publish_public: git pull github && git checkout release && npm --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ publish && git checkout master

author: Jasper den Hertog
